name: Knockback (Blair Nicholson)
description:
There is only one rule in knockback - don't fall off!
Fight off waves of minions and upgrade your stats!

Controls:
WASD to move, Aim with the mouse, Space to jump
Activate the backwards leap ability with Q

I hope to expand on this soon, adding more content and refactoring the systems.

Includes Icons by Lorc, Delapouite licensed under CC-BY-3.0 From https://game-icons.net/

Models, textures, and Animations from Epic Games
